      • readLines

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> readLines(java.io.File file,
                                                         java.util.EnumSet<ReadOptionType> options)
                                                  throws IORuntimeException
        Reads the file into a string array, without end-of-line characters (sequences). Returns empty array on error, unless options contains ReadOptionType.WITH_EXCEPTION.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to read from
        options - options for reading
        Throws:
        IORuntimeException
        See Also:
        ReaderExt.readLines(java.io.Reader, java.util.EnumSet<org.incava.ijdk.io.ReadOptionType>)
